name: Something about pigeons
description:
HELP THIS LITTLE PIGEON TRAVERSE PHYSICAL PUZZLES - WITHOUT FLYING!

PEATER MAY NOT BE ABLE TO FLY, BUT HE SURE CAN EAT. 

FIND ALL BREADCRUMBS AND EAT THEM IN ORDER TO GET STRONGER! 

THIS IS A SANDBOX THAT SHOWCASES 3Cs OF A GAME CONCEPT. 

- SHORT TUTORIAL FOR CONTROLS

- SANDBOX WITH LOTS OF FOOD AND SEVERAL ITEMS TO INTERACT WITH!

- AN ADVANCED ROOM THAT OFFERS A POTENTIAL LEVEL DESIGN 

- AVAILABLE IN FRENCH AND ENGLISH! 

YOAN DELALONDE

JEREMY BECICA

LISA JAUGEY
